text: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 6. Should any bhikkhunī, when a bhikkhu is eating, attend on him with water or a fan, it is to be confessed.
